Name: Acrochat
short description: World's only acronym based/enhanced social networking website
Brief_description: Acrochat formerly Seclang is the world's only acronym based social networking website that permits users to post messages, pictures, videos, play games, and view real-time news-feeds from friends. Our developers embedded a dictionary into the platform created by Acrochat entitled, "Second Language".  Join in on the fun add friends and meet new ones from around the world.
